common.heDidntLeaveBehindASingleWord: He didn't leave behind a single word
common.userAliasFormText: The alias is displayed first, then the username, and finally the user Id.
common.userAvatarFormText: Avatar link, recommended avatar size 260 x 260 or 200 x 200.
common.userOneSentenceFormText: Do you have something you want to say?
common.passwordLengthFormText: Password length should be between 6 and 18 characters.
common.logoutFormText: Are you sure you want to log out?
common.name: Name
common.postNameFormText: The name of the article should reflect the content of the topic.
common.postSelectContentFormText: The name of the article should reflect the content of the topic.
common.postAddTagsFormText: Adding appropriate tags helps to organise and categorise post content.
common.contentLinkFormText: When a content link exists, the content details will not be displayed and will be jumped to directly.
common.coverLinkFormText: Article covers will not be displayed in all scenarios, only in specific scenarios.
common.overviewFormText: The recommended length of the content profile is no more than 160 characters.
common.contentFormText: You can publish articles with just the title, or articles with both title and content.
common.postCoverImageFormText: Only JPG Or PNG format cover image files are supported, with a size of up to 1MB.
common.footerFormText: Built by <name>Youdeyiwu</name>. The source code is available on <link>Github</link>.
common.userRegistrationStatisticsForTheLast15Da: User registration statistics for the last 15 days
common.sorryYouDontHaveAccessToThisButtonYet: Sorry, you don't have access to this button yet
common.enterYourDetailsToGetStarted: Enter your details to get started.
common.usernameFromText: Username length should be between 3 and 16 characters.
common.passwordFromText: Password length should be between 6 and 18 characters.

likeBtn.anonymousUsers: Sorry, anonymous users are not allowed to participate in Likes, please login to do so!

favouriteBtn.anonymousUsers: Sorry, anonymous users are not allowed to add favourites, please login to add favourites

common.rulesForReplying: Please be sure to follow the site's current social rules when replying, thank you!
common.coverLinkProtocols: The cover link only supports HTTP or HTTPS protocols
common.contentLinkProtocols: The content link only supports HTTP or HTTPS protocols
common.refreshFailed: Refresh failed, please click back manually
common.sectionNameFormText: The name of the section, i.e. the name of the content, belongs to a specific category of content.
common.deleteFormText: Please be careful when deleting! Please be patient and wait for the deletion process to complete, as the content will be deleted after you click the Delete button.
common.coverFormText1: The recommended aspect ratio is 16 x 9, e.g. 260 x 195.
common.coverFormText2: and only supports links that use the HTTP or HTTPS protocols.
common.coverFormText3: It is also not shown in all scenes, only in certain scenes.
common.coverFormText4: Supports the upload of image files in JPG or PNG format, with a maximum size of 1MB.
common.contentTopicFormText: Specific description of the current content topic
common.linkProtocols: Links only support HTTP or HTTPS protocols.
common.allowFormText1: Enter the ID of the user you wish to add to the whitelist.
common.allowFormText2: If a user is on both the whitelist and the blacklist, ignore that the user is on the whitelist.
common.blockFormText1: Enter the ID of the user to be added to the blacklist.
common.blockFormText2: If a user is on both the blacklist and the whitelist, ignore that the user is on the whitelist.
common.accessKeyFormText: Access key cannot be empty when locked.
common.whitelistStateFormText: In the whitelist state, the whitelist cannot be empty.
common.blacklistStateFormText: In the blacklist state, the blacklist cannot be empty.
common.adminsFormText: Enter the user ID to be set as the administrator.
common.tagsFormText: Enter the ID of the tag you want to associate.
common.tagGroupsFormText: Enter the Tag Group ID and create a Tag Group if you don't have one.
common.sectionsFormText: Please enter a section id, if you don't have a section, please create one first.
common.updateTagsFormText: Please enter the tag id and create a tag if you don't have one.
common.chooseSectionFormText: Choose a section for the article, i.e. a category for the content.
common.reviewReasonFormText: Please enter the reasons for setting this state, if available, the reason will be communicated to the user via a message.
common.reasonFormText: Optional reason. However, it is recommended that they are filled in to inform the other party of the specific reason, or to express encouragement, etc.
common.estimatedCompletionTimeFormText: The expected completion date of the audit should not be earlier than the current date, so please make a reasonable estimate of the expected completion date!
common.messagesNote: The backend message list will only show global messages, not private messages or user messages.
common.linkFormText: Links can be absolute or relative paths.
common.linksFormText: Formatted as JSON, keys are names, values are links.
common.receiverFormText: Please enter the recipient's user ID
common.messageContentFormText: User-defined message properties in JSON format.
